thread.title: Transfer and Backup Content from Galaxy to iPhones
thread.title_full: Transfer and Backup Content from Galaxy to iPhones

title: Transfer and Backup Content from Galaxy to iPhones
text: Transfer and Backup Content from Galaxy to iPhones , 26 September 2015 -- The iPhone 6S and 6S Plus are Apple’s newest smartphones. The two big screen phones have major updates over the previous iPhone 6 and 6 Plus, with 12-megapixel camera and 4K video recording, “3D Touch” pressure-sensitive display to enable quick actions across the OS, live photos and more. Plan to switch to iPhone 6S or 6S Plus, abandoning your old Samsung Galaxy phone? The advantage of Apple iPhone over Samsung Galaxy phone is the simplicity and style of its software. So, if you need a big screen smartphone but do not like Android phone, iPhone 6S or iPhone 6S Plus is the best choice. When switch to iPhone 6S or 6S Plus from a Galaxy phone, you have to transfer the phone data. How do you move the contacts, messages, music, videos and other document files from your old phone to your new device? Here, we recommend Mobile Swap, which is a professional software to copy data between mobile phones (Android phone, iPhone, Nokia Symbian phone, Windows phone). It supports transfer your old phone data to your new iPhone 6S, iPhone 6S Plus, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus from Samsung Galaxy S3, S4, S5, S6, S6 edge and Note series phones. Similarly, mobile phone backup is an important thing to avoid unexpected data losing. Currently, iPhone and Android phones are popular, if you use an iPhone, iOS Manager – TunesGo is the best choice. If you use an Android phone, Mobile Swap for Android can help you backup Android phone data to PC or Mac with ease. Taking Samsung Galaxy S5 as an example, with Mobile Swap for Android, you can back up all important data to PC or Mac, including apps, music, videos, photos, contacts, SMS and files. Furthermore, you can transfer the mentioned data to Galaxy S5 from computer, such as important iTunes music to Galaxy S5, transfer photos to Galaxy S5, etc. Allpepole software at App store:
